name: FearMongster Prototype
description:
The Player is a monster and must stay in the shadows of a room where a human is sleeping. The monster must make the human feel restless, and goes from spot to spot to avoid being detected when the human turns the light on when hearing noise.

The Monster will hide in the shadows under the bed, in the closet, anything to hide from the light since they die if the light touches them, and thus cannot be seen by human eyes.

Level Progression and much more would be implemented if I ever continue on this project
